Title: Bluegreen Vacations
CO_managers: BofA Merrill Lynch/ SunTrust Robinson Humphrey
Business: We are a leading vacation ownership company that markets and sells VOIs and manages resorts in top leisure and urban destinations. Our resort network includes 42 Club Resorts (resorts in which owners in our Vacation Club have the right to use most of the units in connection with their VOI or vacation ownership interests) and 24 Club Associate Resorts (resorts in which owners in our Vacation Club have the right to use a limited number of units in connection with their VOI ownership). Our Club Resorts and Club Associate Resorts are primarily located in popular high-volume “drive-to” vacation locations, including Orlando, Las Vegas, Myrtle Beach and Charleston, among others. Our Vacation Club has grown to approximately 210,000 owners as of July 31, 2017, from approximately 170,000 owners as of Dec. 31, 2012.
